name: Nicholas Mullins
headline: Technology Leader | Software Engineer | Problem Whisperer
about: I'm Nicholas Mullins — a technology leader and software developer with over a decade of experience building systems and leading teams. I’ve worked across enterprise platforms, taught college-level computer science, and thrive at the intersection of engineering, collaboration, and mentorship. I believe in scalable code, honest leadership, and never deploying on Fridays.

experience.summary: As a technology leader at Merkle, I spearhead the development and delivery of scalable loyalty and promotions engineering solutions. My role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and implement systems that enhance customer engagement and drive business growth. With over 12 years of experience in the tech industry, I focus on building both robust systems and high-performing teams, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement.
Taught Game Design, C++, Java, and Swift courses as an adjunct instructor. Emphasized hands-on learning, real-world development practices, and student engagement in computer science fundamentals.
